Description of incident: A former employee was able to access the Segmark Solutions computer system.  It is unclear if the former employee guessed passwords, used passwords that had not been changed, or used some other method to access the computer system.  He then used credit card information in the system to make fraudulent purchases. Damages caused a total of $7,000.  The former employee was caught after a six-month investigation and charged with second degree computer crime and illegal use of credit cards.
